ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron looks up at Menasor, and sighs. That s right Menasor, crush the Gestalt he screamed. He then used the amplification of Astroblast again. Cyclonus,

Megatron looks up at Menasor, and sighs. "That's right Menasor, crush
the Gestalt" he screamed. He then used the amplification of Astroblast
again. "Cyclonus, Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, Scourge. Abandon your
mission, and meet me down here" he yelled.

Sinnertwin was getting bored, and noticed Menasor merge (kinda hard not
to) he jumped up, transformed, and flew towards Megatron.

Megatron floated out of Astroblast, and landed on the CF, and walked
towards the nearest Autogun. He then grabbed it, and used his strength
to rip it out. (YAn, I dont know if you post for it if it rips out or
not).
